argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elxr | |- ( A e. RR* <-> ( A e. RR \/ A = +oo \/ A = -oo ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rexneg | |- ( A e. RR -> -e A = -u A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( A e. RR -> -u A e. RR ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. RR -> -e A e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_rexrd | |- ( A e. RR -> -e A e. RR* ) |
| 6 |  | #P_xnegeq | |- ( A = +oo -> -e A = -e +oo ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xnegpnf | |- -e +oo = -oo |
| 8 |  | #P_mnfxr | |- -oo e. RR* |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- -e +oo e. RR* |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( A = +oo -> -e A e. RR* ) |
| 11 |  | #P_xnegeq | |- ( A = -oo -> -e A = -e -oo ) |
| 12 |  | #P_xnegmnf | |- -e -oo = +oo |
| 13 |  | #P_pnfxr | |- +oo e. RR* |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqeltri | |- -e -oo e. RR* |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( A = -oo -> -e A e. RR* ) |
| 16 | 5, 10, 15 | #P_3jaoi | |- ( ( A e. RR \/ A = +oo \/ A = -oo ) -> -e A e. RR* ) |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_sylbi | |- ( A e. RR* -> -e A e. RR* ) |
